# simd_make_uchar16(_:)

**Function**

Returns a new vector with the first element set to a scalar value, and other elements set to zero.

## Declaration

```swift
func simd_make_uchar16(_ other: UInt8) -> simd_uchar16
```

## Functions to Create Sixteen-Element Vectors From Scalar Values

- **simd_make_uchar16_undef(_:)**: Returns a new vector with the first element set to a scalar value, and other elements undefined.

items.description: Returns a new vector with the first element set to a scalar value, and other elements undefined.
